value:
$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|$w0|It's time that I introduce myself.
I am Eliwood of Pherae.$k$pWe are obliged to battle you,
given the contract that binds us.$k$pWhat is that? You have crossed
paths with my son, Roy?$k$pHow curious. Well, I'm sure that
Roy will become a far better
fighter than me in due time.$k$pBut I promise to give you a
battle that you'll never forget.
Come now—let's begin.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You are truly powerful—and more
so than we are. Fortunately,
that frees us from the contract!$k$pThank you. I hope that we will
meet again under friendlier
circumstances.$k$pAnd perhaps then Roy can fight
alongside his old father. What
a sight that would be!$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|What an accomplishment, freeing
the World of Blazing! Well done,
everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Is it just me, or do you seem a bit
quiet, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Perhaps you're thinking about what
troubles me, too. Our missing
comrade, Zacharias.$k$p$EFace|The further we get, the more it
bothers me how Zacharias is
nowhere to be found.$k$pI hate losing anyone, but it hits
Alfonse and Sharena harder. They
were all friends since childhood.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Zacharias was more than just a
skilled lancer. He was kind and as
loyal a friend as you can imagine.$k$p$EFace_Anger|When he vanished, we split up in
search of him, taking different
gateways to different worlds.$k$p$EFace_Pain|We looked everywhere. But we never
found him, and he never returned.$k$pWe even had the wild notion that
Veronica had closed the gate to the
world where we'd been battling.$k$pFor how then could he ever come
back by himself? Only we royals of
Askr could open the way again.$k$pWe went to that world most of all,
searching and scouring, but...
nothing.$k$p$EFace_Cool|That was the World of Awakening.
Perhaps we should look there
once more—with you?$k$pYou've helped us make so many
gains since you arrived. I suggest
that we give it one last try.$k$Sbs150|
